linkSkill.name: Courage
linkSkill.shortDesc: When attacking a boss monster, damage by 4%, if the attack target is a boss monster, damage increases by 2% for each stack every 2 seconds, stackable up to 6 times, duration 5 seconds

<tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/light-leap.png} tip={Light Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-penni.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Penni}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-ii.png} tip={Forest Power II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-wind.png} tip={Forest Wind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/strike-2.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-1.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/sweep.png} tip={Sweep}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/vitality-affinity.png} tip={Vitality Affinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-paeon.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Paeon}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-iii.png} tip={Forest Power III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/natures-providence.png} tip={Nature's Providence}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/strike-3.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/earth-pulverization.png} tip={Earth Pulverization}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-2.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/sneak-attack.png} tip={Sneak Attack}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/focus-support-flight.png} tip={[Focus] Support Flight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/purify.png} tip={Purify}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/commune.png} tip={Commune}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/guardians-signet.png} tip={Guardian's Signet}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-iv.png} tip={Forest Power IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/focus-heal-boost.png} tip={[Focus] Heal Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/natures-providence-boost.png} tip={Nature's Providence Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/strike-4.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/roar.png} tip={Roar}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-3.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/predators-blow.png} tip={Predator's Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/whirlwind.png} tip={Whirlwind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/mother-natures-touch.png} tip={Mother Nature's Touch}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/support-flight.png} tip={Support Flight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-earth-reinforce-140.png} tip={Heaven Earth - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-earth-boss-rush-180.png} tip={Heaven Earth - Boss Rush}> Heaven Earth - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/coercion-reinforce-140.png} tip={Coercion - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/coercion-magic-enhancement-180.png} tip={Coercion - Magic Enhancement}> Coercion - Reinforce and Magic Enhancement_<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/barrier-shield-reinforce-165.png} tip={Barrier - Shield Reinforce}> Barrier - Shield Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-stomp.png} tip={Earth Stomp (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/black-tornado-kick-160.png} tip={Black Tornado Kick (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/transformation.png} tip={Transformation (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-punch.png} tip={Heaven Earth Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/chain-attack.png} tip={Chain Attack (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-thunderbolt-strike.png} tip={Heaven: Thunderbolt Strike (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-upper-punch.png} tip={Heaven: Upper Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-wind-spin-kick.png} tip={Wind Spin Kick (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-smash-kick.png} tip={Earth Smash Kick (2nd Job)}>

6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Drakkinnite, Lantic, Gon, and the members of the Mo Xuan Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability

extraContent.title: Focus Skills & Spirit Guide Skills
extraContent.content:
While Lynn is in a party, they can select a party member as a 'Focal Target' which skills labelled as [Focus] will affect. If Lynn is not in a party or is in a party by themselves, they will be the Focal Target. Using the Beginner Skill [Focus], Lynn can choose who the Focal Target is

Below is a list of all Focus Skills:

  • [Focus] Heal - 1st Job
  • [Focus] Support Flight - 3rd Job
  • [Focus] Forest Protection - Hyper Skill
  • [Focus] Awaken - 5th Job

Focal Target cannot be yourself for [Focus] Support Flight & Awaken

Lynn's attacks can be categorized by their Spirit Guides, Pan, Penni, and Paeon. Each Spirit Guide provides a stacking %Final Damage (additively) buff whenever their attacks successfully hit an enemy

Below is a list of all Pan attacks:

  • Strike - 1st Job
  • Earth Pulverization - 3rd Job
  • Roar - 4th Job

Below is a list of all Penni attacks:

  • Peck - 2nd Job
  • Sweep - 2nd Job
  • Whirlwind - 4th Job

Below is a list of all Paeon attacks:

  • Sneak Attack - 3rd Job
  • Predator's Blow - 4th Job
  • Raid - Hyper Skill
  • Beast's Rage - 5th Job

primary.name: Return to Xuan Mountain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Move back to the Forest Spring.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Xuan Mountain Momentum
primary.shortDesc: Increases final damage by 10% and critical damage by 10%
details: This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Heaven Punch
primary.shortDesc: Activates the current mountain's initial state when used\nHyunsan: When acquiring the first form [Heaven], you can attack up to 1 time\nHyunsan: When acquiring the 2nd form [Heaven], you can attack up to 2 times.

primary.name: First Form Heaven
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 10 MP\nType 1 [Heaven]: Attacks up to 4 enemies 6 times with 60% damage.

primary.name: Heaven Upper Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times with 260% damage.\n[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 50%\nCooldown: 5 seconds

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Up Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to leap a greater distance.

primary.name: Awakening
primary.shortDesc: Critical rate 30%, attack power increased by 50\nRecovers 3% of maximum HP/MP every 3 seconds, recovery possible even during battle

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Increases DEX by 30 and Attack Power by 20

primary.name: Earth Stomp
primary.shortDesc: Activates the current mountain's initial state when used\nHyunsan: When acquiring the first form [Earth], you can attack up to 1 time\nHyunsan: When acquiring the 2nd form [Earth], you can attack up to 2 times.

primary.name: Wu Shen: First Form Earth
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 22 MP\nType 1 [Earth]: Attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times with 110% damage.

primary.name: Earth Smash Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Attacks up to 8 enemies 9 times with 300% damage.\n[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 50%\nCooldown: 8 seconds

primary.name: Berserk
primary.shortDesc: Attack speed level 2, DEX +20

primary.name: Light Air Training
primary.shortDesc: Movement speed increased by 50, jump power increased by 20, and maximum movement speed increased by 20.

primary.name: Outdoor Training
primary.shortDesc: Increases DEX by 30, Defense by 300, and Max HP by 20%\nReduces damage taken by 10%, increases stance rate by 40%

primary.name: Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Increases skill proficiency by 50%, increases attack power by 30

primary.name: Fast Move
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 40 MP. move forward quickly\nThe number of uses is prepared once every 4 seconds, and can be used up to 5 times consecutively.

primary.name: Rise in the World
primary.shortDesc: When you use a super power to link a divine power, the [super power link] effect is activated, and the divine power obtained can be stacked up to 3 times.\nEach divine skill held lasts for 45 seconds and increases final damage by 3%.

primary.name: Heaven Thunderbolt Strike
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 45, Attacks up to 3 enemies 9 times for 350% damage.
[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 100%
Enemies attacked are incapacitated for 3 seconds.
The target of this skill will not be incapacitated by the skill: Wall Strike for 45 seconds.
Cooldown: 45 seconds

primary.name: Earth Wind Spin Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Attacks up to 8 enemies 9 times with 430% damage.\n[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 100%\nCooldown: 15 seconds

primary.name: Transformation
primary.shortDesc: When the skill is activated, up to 4 remnants are created that attack nearby enemies 3 times with 400% damage.\nRemnant Attack cooldown: 1.5 seconds

primary.name: New Training I
primary.shortDesc: Divine Skill: Increases the damage of Ascension by 160%p\nDivine Skill: Increases damage of Shatter Angle by 60%p

primary.name: Evade Attack
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 40 MP, moves a certain distance backwards\n6 second cooldown\n[Passive effect: 20% increase in evasion rate]

primary.name: Internal Training
primary.shortDesc: Critical rate 20%, status ailment resistance 30, all property resistance 30%, defense power 50% increase

primary.name: Innate Skills
primary.shortDesc: Increases final damage by 10%, damage by 30%, and attack power by 20

primary.name: Incarnation
primary.shortDesc: [Divine Circulation] Cooldown reduced by 25%, final damage of Divine Circulation skills increased by 50%.\n[Divine Power] Maximum number of divine powers that can be held increased to 5, duration of each divine power increased to 60 seconds, final damage increased by 10%.

primary.name: Second Form Heaven
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 40 MP\n2nd [Heaven]: Attacks up to 6 enemies 4 times with 300% damage.\nHyunsan: Increase damage of the first form [Heaven] by 240%p

primary.name: Second Form Earth
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 40 MP\n2nd [Earth]: Attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times with 270% damage.\nHyunsan: Increases damage of the first type [Earth] by 160%p

primary.name: New Training II
primary.shortDesc:
Divine Skill: Increases the damage of Ascension by 600%p
Divine Skill: Increases damage of Shatter Angle by 30%p
Divine Skill: Increases damage of Wall Strike by 350%p
Divine Skill: Increases damage of Whirlwind Kick by 140%p

primary.name: Chain Attack
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Hold key down for up to 5 seconds, Attacks up to 6 enemies 3 times with 380% damage every 0.2 seconds
When keydown ends, attacks up to 8 enemies 12 times with 430% damage, and cannot be pushed back by any enemy attacks while keydown is in progress.
[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 100%
60 sec cooldown

primary.name: Shadowless Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Instantly moves to the enemy with the highest maximum HP and attacks 12 times with 540% damage, incapacitating the attacked enemy for 10 seconds.\nSecret: Increases the duration of incapacitation by up to 100% based on the damage given to the enemy with the Invisible Angle.\nCooldown 180 seconds

primary.name: Release of Divine Power
primary.shortDesc:
Increases critical damage of surrounding party members by 8% for 30 seconds.
When casting a skill, if Mukhyeon's [Divine Power] is at its maximum, the effect is strengthened and the critical damage of surrounding party members increases by an additional 2%.
Cooldown 180 seconds
[Passive Effect: Increases Critical Damage by 5%]

primary.name: Barrier
primary.shortDesc:
Consumes 150 MP, creates a shield that blocks enemy attacks for 20 seconds
When first cast, received damage reduced by 100%, including attacks that deal damage at a percentage of maximum HP, each subsequent attack reduces damage received by 15%, and minimum received damage reduction by 20%
Cooldown 180 seconds
[Passive effect: 20% reduction in damage received]

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs

primary.name: Coercion
primary.shortDesc: When attacking boss monsters, damage is increased by 20%, monster defense rate is ignored by 30%, and stance rate is increased by 60%

primary.name: Wuji Magic Power
primary.shortDesc: Martial Arts skill increased to 70%\nIncreases attack power by 30 and ignores monster defense by 20%

hyperPassive.name: Coercion - Magic Enhancement
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Reduces the cooldown of the new skill cycle by 5% and increases the final damage by 5%. The enhancement value is applied in combination with the existing skill.

hyperPassive.name: Awakening - Extra Healing
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases recovery rate by an additional 3%. Comprehensive application to the existing recovery rate

hyperPassive.name: Rise in the World - Persist
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases power retention time by 30 seconds. Totally applied to the existing maintenance time

hyperActive.name: Descend God of War
hyperActive.shortDesc: Gain maximum divine power when used\nCooldown: 60 seconds\n[Passive effect: 10% increase in final damage]

hyperActive.name: Black Tornado Kick
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP 350 consumed, explosion that attacks up to 12 enemies with 450% damage 12 times, triggers 10 times, invincibility during casting\nCooldown: 60 seconds

hyperActive.name: Aura of Destiny
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Lynn characters in the party.

fifthMain.name: Dark Sky Attack
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, Attacks up to 15 enemies with 800% damage 12 times, Invincibility for 4 seconds\nCooldown 180 seconds

fifthMain.name: Ultra Instinct
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 900, creates up to 9 remnants that attack enemies for 720% damage 4 times over 30 seconds.\nRemnant attack cooldown 1.5 seconds. When the duration is over, the new skill: Heterogeneity is automatically activated.\nCooldown 180 seconds

fifthMain.name: Unleashed Energy
fifthMain.shortDesc: Consumes 650 MP, activates 100% additional critical rate for all attacks for 30 seconds, increases critical damage by 25%\nAdditionally, the damage of the beginner and new skills used during the duration increases by 350%p, and the number of attacks increases by 2 times (However, the number of attacks of skills increased by the effect of True Energy: Explosion cannot exceed 15.)\nCooldown 180 seconds

fifthMain.name: Giant Mountain Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Attacks up to 12 enemies 9 times with 700% damage.\n[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 100%\n60 sec cooldown

fifthBoost.name: Earth Pulverization and Roar Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Earth Pulverization and Roar Final Damage: +120%

fifthBoost.name: Predator's Blow and Raid Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Predator's Blow and Raid Final Damage: +120%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-punch.png} tip={Heaven Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-stomp.png} tip={Earth Stomp (2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Heaven Punch
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP 55 consumption\nHyunsan: Type 1 [Heaven] VI: Attacks up to 4 enemies 6 times with 650% damage.\nHyunsan: 2nd Form [Heaven] VI: Attacks up to 4 enemies 6 times with 650% damage.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Earth Stomp
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP 55 consumption\nHyunsan: Type 1 [Earth] VI: Attacks up to 9 enemies 6 times with 590% damage.\nHyunsan: 2nd Form [Earth] VI: Attacks up to 9 enemies 6 times with 590% damage

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/chain-attack.png} tip={Chain Attack (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Chain Attack
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, Hold key down for up to 3 seconds, Attacks up to 6 enemies 4 times with 680% damage every 0.2 seconds
When keydown ends, attacks up to 8 enemies 12 times with 830% damage, and cannot be pushed back by any enemy attacks while keydown is in progress.
[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 100%
60 sec cooldown

originSkill.name: Pahwang Punch
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, invincibility during casting, damage up to 15 enemies by 4980% After 8 successful attacks with a damage of 5880%, The final hit that attacks 10 times with damage occurs 16 times\nAfter the final strike, the martial state is maintained even if no divine attack is linked for 120 seconds.\nCooldown 360 seconds

boostCore.name: Unleashed Energy Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Jin-gi: Increases the critical damage of explosion by 30%, duration 35 seconds, damage of the first and second skills used during the duration is 550%p increase

meta: Mo Xuan is an DEX pirate class part of its own class group, Forest Child. Mo Xuan utilize War Fists as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Lynn can equip Fist Rings
